pr_title: Refactored the FileSortedSet to avoid dependency on java Serializable.

timeline.bodyText: This exception isn't thrown, so the build fails.
timeline.author: brianloss

timeline.bodyText: This exception isn't thrown, so the build fails.
timeline.author: brianloss

timeline.bodyText: This exception isn't thrown anymore, so the build fails.
timeline.author: brianloss

timeline.message:
Refactored the FileSortedSet to avoid dependency on java Serializable.
This allows extending the implementation to use a Writable such as the
accumulo Key object.  Updated the ivarator to use sets of Key objects
instead of sets of KeyValueSerializable object removing unnecessary object
creations.
